faces.title: Gemilang Arena: Burning Bright

stripped_text: When your action phase ends, if you played an operation this turn, gain 1 credit and flip this identity.
text: When your action phase ends, if you played an operation this turn, gain 1[credit] and flip this identity.
title: Nebula Talent Management: Making Stars
